name: Der Mord
description:
WASD to move, E to interact.

Thanks to  creators on freesound.com and here on itch.io. Resources have been used according to their license and those are included with the distribution.

I made this mainly to get situated with Godot and do some workflow experiments. I was happy with the results. Even though I produced very little content, I learned quite a bit about the engine, some skills dealing with 3d art, and some better ways to develop in the future. Next I'll try to improve the performance of the export and make something that's a bit more interesting to play (and something that's finished).
